website_summaries.verdict: A portable Bluetooth alarm clock that enables you to play music from your phone, MP3 player, or micro SD card.
pros: Touch LED light with relaxing color changes — 48 in all
Built-in battery allows you to take the speaker with you wherever you go
Works with MP3 player or micro SD card
cons: You can only set a single alarm, so it's not ideal if you don't want to change your alarm every night

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker
customer_reviews.text: Gifted to a 12 year old. She loved it! Looks nice and he sound is pretty good. Setting it up was a breeze. The light it gives off is pretty decent as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Manring

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound, but missing one critical items for an alarm clock.
customer_reviews.text: Overall it is a decent little speaker. The sounds is a lot better than I was expecting, pretty decent. It has some nice features. - It sure would be nice to have a radio tuner. I bought this as an alarm clock and thought it had a radio. But as the description says it does not. - This is not necessarily hard to set up, but it is far from intuitive. Over time if you change things often you would get them memorized, but I am sure I will need to keep the instructions handy. But that can be difficult when you have kids around.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Henney

customer_reviews.title: EH
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 7 y/o to wake up to in the morning! It is NOT user friendly! Especially if trying to use for an alarm! There is only one setting for sound LOUD AF!!! There is no humanly way possible to adjust the volume for the alarm. Plus it doesn’t allow for am/fm radio play when waking up, only an annoying alarm melody. To get the alarm to turn off you have to go through a series of steps instead of pressing a button... this is frustrating for my 7 year old! The color changing is awesome and the speaker sound is great so it works very well as a Bluetooth speaker!
customer_reviews.author: JessMcManus

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these as presents for my 11 and 12 yo kids. Both love listening to music. I love that you can connect both Aux and Bluetooth, and the lights are neat, especially when they dance to the music. I was pleasantly surprised that it was battery powered as well, which was a nice touch, and was honestly surprised at the sound quality being pretty decent (as someone with a variety of both Bose and Studio Monitors).
customer_reviews.author: CF

customer_reviews.title: Flair!
customer_reviews.text: Great alarm clock. Bright vibrant light. Ok sound(for the price) and way to use instructions. Kicks the room up a notch. It fits the theme of my room, so I had to get it. You should also know it requires a USB to mini USB outlet. But it does charge itself.
customer_reviews.author: Trust Me

customer_reviews.title: Works easy once you figure out the settings
customer_reviews.text: Was bigger than I expected. Works easy I put it in the bathroom. My dad uses his mp3 for music and I have mine with the Bluetooth. Works fine sounds good. I suck at hearing and I sure can hear this! Also you Can unplug it and it still works I’m not sure for how long but I thought that was really cool. I did end up purchasing another one because my dad loves the colors it comes with! Sound quality is good too. He loves the fact he can unplug it and take it wherever. Or just outside and watch the lights & change them to his liking.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: Edit: they are sending me a replacement, free of charge. Good customer service, even after normal return period has ended. Hopefully the new one is better! Had problems from the beginning. The battery doesn’t last. I keep it plugged in all the time and it still randomly shouts “low power” at me before turning off.
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: Great multi purpose product - works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought this primarily as a night light with alarm functionality. I was pleasantly surprised with its bluetooth speaker functionality, great touch based control for colorful lights, versatility to charge with USB and play songs using flash drive, memory card. This is a great bedside clock which I always wanted to avoid looking at my phone. I would have liked if dancing lights changed based on the actual audio tune that would have been the best feature but that's just wishful thinking. It still has nice party colorful light for any small home party :)
customer_reviews.author: Nilay C.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is great! The lights are nice and the sound quality is better than I expected. Customer support for this product was also exceptional. Thank you Judy!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Martines

customer_reviews.title: 📻 Better than I expected! ⏰🎵🔦📱
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to set up with the directions. It does everything I was looking for. My daughter uses a night light and I wanted something that would save space. This is an alarm clock, night light, and bluetooth speaker in one. The light has 7 different settings...low natural light to bright, 3 blue settings, and one that flashes different colors to the beat of the music. The color can be changed just by touching the top of the speaker. It came with an Aux and a USB cord. The back has a slot for a memory card, USB for charging or connecting a phone and power the device, AUX, on/off button.
customer_reviews.author: 5ive Cents

customer_reviews.title: Nice value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these for my teen girl, and we liked it so much, we got one for our teen boy as well. The color options make it a fun option, and the clock/alarm options are great too. This digital clock/speaker definitely requires using and following the instructions, because there are so many features and they are all controlled by how you hit the mode button and use the left and right (rewind/fforward buttons). Not 100% intuitive, but as long as you never lose the instructions, this is a good product. Seems good quality. Recommend buying a USB plug with it, so you have the option of keeping it plugged in and using it as a clock that stays on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to use, bright lights
customer_reviews.text: This has a lot of features I was looking for to put in a child's room. My favorite feature is that you can always see the time display. The bluetooth speaker is a nice feature. The variety of colors is great and it is easy for children to change them by just touching the top gently. My lease favorite feature is how bright the colors are when in a dark room. I mean they are really bright, I don't know how they don't bother my daugher. Only the white light is able to be dimmed.
customer_reviews.author: Lenore

customer_reviews.title: Nice bluetooth speaker and night light
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 6 year-old to listen to Sparkle Stories while she goes to sleep without us having to retrieve a tablet or phone from her room after she drifts off - the Bluetooth range extends to the floor above, so we can just stream the story til it's done. The sound is crystal clear for stories and impromptu dance parties, and the nightlight is bright to my daughter's preference. She loves being able to select a different color every night (48, you can select a rotating color option as well which isn't her fancy). Haven't used the alarm function because... well, she's 6, but I imagine it will come in handy later!
customer_reviews.author: blogwash

customer_reviews.title: Great night light / speaker
customer_reviews.text: We've used this for a year for my daughter's room as a nightlight and speaker. She used to want to listen to music while falling asleep. I didn't want to have a bluetooth device paired to it so the ability to use an SD card with music was perfect. The only challenge I've found is the lowest volume setting seems a little loud on certain songs. Great value for the money and perfect for our needs. We leave it plugged in all the time so I can't comment on battery life.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought but enough light and sound
customer_reviews.text: My mother loves her little nightlight I got for her. I connected the Bluetooth and she can play her music but she forgot and tried to make calls and I think she couldn't be heard... i think because it's doesn't have a microphone but I changed the Bluetooth to just audio not phone calls and she's happy again. Not too loud for me but perfect for her. Perfect for her, small and compact! Small footprint
customer_reviews.author: The Garcia Fam!

customer_reviews.title: Good product, poor instruction manual
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is cool. Nice bright colors, great sound. Alarm clock sound is nice. I don't like that you have to tap it to get the clock to come back on once it's sleeping. The instructions are horrible...like a non-English speaking person wrote them...terrible grammar and punctuation. Listening to it now and the sound is much louder and clearer than originally thought :-) P.S. The snooze on the alarm is very picky....sometimes I have to hit the top multiple times to get it to shut up, which in turn makes the light come on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Such a great addition to you home!
customer_reviews.text: This looks very modern and trendy. The colors are stunning. It made my apartment looks so nice! Easy to install and work. Has so many setting Night light Bluetooth Speaker, Alarm Clock Bluetooth Speaker Touch Control Color Changing Bedside Lamp, Portable Wireless Speaker with Lights!!! I am very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Patinka

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lighting features
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that this nightlight has multiple pretty colors that fit my mood. Right now I am in love with the blue light. It's nice and soft and not too bright. I use it also for the alarm feature as I need a second alarm clock to wake me up before work starts. I was hoping it was a little lighter when you pick it up, but it's not too big of a deal as I am more into the aesthetics. I'm pretty happy with my multifunctional nightlight overall.
customer_reviews.author: Little Girl Big World

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift fo rkids
customer_reviews.text: Gifted this to my niece, shes 7, and she loves it. It fits perfect on her nightstand and the color changing feature brings her so much joy! Its great since they leave the light on for her when she sleeps and it acts as a night light. We also paired her iPad so she uses it as a speaker and carries it around with her everywhere! Surprisingly it sounds pretty good!
customer_reviews.author: Plastik

customer_reviews.title: good performance, but settings arent intuitive.
customer_reviews.text: it looks cool, and great as a little portable speaker. I also love using it as a nightlight next to my bed. My main complaint however is its button interface. It is a little counter-intuitive in what modes do what and how to set the alarm. It's not a huge deal to set the time once, but my job schedule changes and it isnt super convenient changing the alarm with this. I wish the controls were simplified or made more clear. I don't recommend it as an alarm for this reason, but great otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Mossburg

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: The speaker on this is fantastic. The sound is very clear. For such a small speaker, it’s very loud. The alarm clock is so loud that you can hear it from across the house. It’s easy to use as long as you follow the instructions. We keep it charging; so, I am not too sure about the battery life on it. The lights and the speaker on this product make it worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great multifunctional speaker !!
customer_reviews.text: It came with very solid package without any damages and has a very stylish looking. The Bluetooth is so easy to use, unlike my previous speaker that needs so many efforts to connect. You just need to click the Bluetooth on the cube, and connect it on your phone, boom! It’s done!! So fast!! You can also change the color by pat it, and it seems has another function to change its light automatically but I haven’t try it.
customer_reviews.author: Valentine

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and needed to help me sleep
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is amazing. The different light modes help you create the ambiance you desire. I use it to help me sleep as I listen to meditation mixes. My phone speaker was not loud enough and hauling my other heavy Bluetooth speaker through the house twice a day was burdensome. This has a clock, great sound, and is of great quality. I had to read the instruction manual because it is very sophisticated. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Ann Meade

customer_reviews.title: Too Complicated
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this clock for almost two years now. I still cannot figure out how to set the alarm, even after using the instructions, and trying on multiple occasions. I also can't get the correct time to display for more than a week. The light is nice but that's about it.
customer_reviews.author: OrlandoPaula

customer_reviews.title: awesome alarm clock!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome alarm clock. I got this alarm clock so I wouldn't have to keep my phone by my bed. It exceeded expectations. Haven't used the bluetooth speaker much, but it works great when I do. The functions are all great! The light might be the best part. It is easy to operate with a tap on the top of the light. Super nice when getting up quick in the dark, I just tap the light on and bring it wherever I am going so I don't blind myself with the main lights in rooms. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: themenofthewest

customer_reviews.title: Overall Nice Product!
customer_reviews.text: Overall good quality. Speaker surprised me for how small it is. The light is plenty bright enough for a night light and it dims with the white color. The only downfall is the usb has no output for charging phones (99% on the market do chargeeven the $10 ones at Walmart). I bought it knowing this but still a downfall.
customer_reviews.author: Regan

customer_reviews.title: Its okay
customer_reviews.text: No volume control for the alarm. Special features that I wasn't I didn't want to do with recording music to a special card to just make something work. Alarm function with volume control should be already built in. And special recording of music to a removal card should be needed. Not worth messing around with it.
customer_reviews.author: hkygrl1

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: We like this but it’s a bit hard to figure out how to use. There are lots of features which is great but like I said it’s hard to get from one thing to the next. Also it’s very loud when it talks and sometimes it wakes up my daughter when I’m trying to turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: KikiLouMom

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: The sound system is great the the colors changes on the rythem you play music, it is good for camping sites or if you are in the pool and you don't want to take out ur laptop and the surrounding system, easy to conect to bluetooth, check the manual if you weren't able to figure it out.. i highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Gigglypuff

customer_reviews.title: Lights malfunctioned and Bluetooth wouldn’t connect
customer_reviews.text: We could only get the lights to go on/off or change when we picked up the entire speaker; we couldn’t do it if the speaker was sitting on the shelf. We also only got it to connect to the Bluetooth once and then it wouldn’t connect again. When the lights worked it was actually very pretty. The sound quality was just OK.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M.

customer_reviews.title: Totally happy with it
customer_reviews.text: So here we get 3 in 1, clock, Bluetooth speaker and lamp. It wasn't enough light in my room so here is the perfect solution, it has 48!!! Different colors. Multiple modes, you can choose any of those colors, or you can make your room be a party room with blicking mode where colors are changing fast. Sound quality is great, volume pretty decent. You also get alarm clock here and you can set up any of your favorite songs to play as alarm clock. You connect it with cable, Bluetooth or sd card. Battery lasts for 8 hours. Great quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Oleksandr R

customer_reviews.title: Good Sounding
customer_reviews.text: This Bluetooth speaker is a great addition ti my space with the changing light color options to the beat of the music its playing. The quality of the speaker is great, and the bluetooth connects really well. It's definitely an awesome speaker for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Maritza Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I really like how it's an alarm clock and night light. The light changes to very beautiful colors. I like that you can just tap the top to change brightness, color and on/off. It makes it easy for my daughter to use and adjust to how she wants it.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Small,cute, and useful
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an alarm clock with music. This has an alarm clock, Bluetooth and LED lights. The sound is nice and quality was surprisingly nice. I was excited that you charge it and it can be moved around if you're using the speaker in different places. They also send an aux cord and charger. It has a microsd card slot and USB in the back. Very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Jerny

customer_reviews.title: A wrong made right
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product refurbished and it did not work properly. I returned it for a full refund and the company not only provided my refund in a timely manner but insisted on sending a new identical speaker as well. It is by far the best Bluetooth speaker and nightlight I have ever had. My special needs daughter would rather watch it and listen to music then watch television. I am very pleased with the product and the company and highly recommend them. Thank you for the impeccable service.
customer_reviews.author: Christalhill

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker.. good customer service
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friend who has a crappy radio alarm. I liked this because you could leave it plugged in, but comes with no usb charger, only cable. Mode menu seems hard to navigate for non techies. Had trouble with getting mp3 to play from usb, but customer service was great and shipped me a replacement unit. Bluetooth works well and I like the speaker quality.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mujumdar

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Fancy bluetooth speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I love this multipurpose bluetooth speaker very much!It has a function for night light and it changes colors when tapping the top of the metal net. I can switch to modes so I can set up the alarm ,and play music when connet with bluetooth from my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Yan Yi Li

customer_reviews.title: Confusing alarm clock
customer_reviews.text: It's very pretty and seems well made, but I can't figure out for the life of me how to set the alarm. Or rather, I can set the alarm, but it never goes off. Never had so much trouble figuring out how to make an alarm work. o.O Updated: Seller helped me figure out what I was doing wrong. Works great now, although I'll leave 1 star off to reflect the initial troubles with the interface.
customer_reviews.author: Nintari Atendo

customer_reviews.title: How does this have 4.5 stars??
customer_reviews.text: Setting up an alarm for this thing is a bit nightmarish. I mainly bought it to play an mp3 to wake me up instead of using a phone or laptop. It *does* work, but is clumsy and utterly unintuitive. I guess it's ok for a nerd like me, but I don't see how "normal" people would ever figure out how to use this thing. How does this have 4.5 stars?? I feel like the company must have paid somewhat to improve its rating. Meh.
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great idea but not the best product. I bought this a couple of months ago and the battery stopped working it could only be unplugged for a couple of minutes before loudly going “low battery”. They send me a new one but not a month after I couldn’t connect it to my phone so now it’s useless.
customer_reviews.author: Dayztu

customer_reviews.title: The lights and music are great..
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter. The lights and music are great... the digital clock can stay on which my daughter loves to check periodically throughout the night. The sound quality was much better than what I had expected as I had a jawbone. This really impressed my daughter and I. I would definitely reccomend. The customer service was amazing when I had emailed with questions and they explained the additional options the light included. If I had any questions or concerns... I know the customer service would provide and answer immediately!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Condron

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker
customer_reviews.text: This product is a combination of alarm clock, night light and speaker. Its color is beautiful. I can use different color with my mood, so amazing. The blue mode can link the speaker with my iphone or ipad, the speaker is so cool. The line mode can connect the speaker with my computer, the sound was beautiful. I love the deserved product, it is so cool.
customer_reviews.author: anonymity

customer_reviews.title: If only it made julienne fries
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something for our living room with a clock on it. We keep it plugged in, and the clock function stays lit. We also keep the top bit lit up orange, like a night light. I'm sure the Bluetooth speaker function will come in handy too.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is pretty good and high, has lights are colorful. I got it for my cousin’s room and she loved it. Has time and date on it. You can connect with Bluetooth or aux , also has usb socket. Loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Asiye Baki

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars! Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it this morning, arrived a few hours later! Spent about 5 minutes reading the instructions as there are many functions, easily set the time, played with the pretty colors, and then tried out the Bluetooth feature. For such a small and relatively inexpensive product, the sound quality was better than I expected. I am glad the bass sound was still in the music.
customer_reviews.author: Stephalotontop

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: Overall it's a pretty nice speaker. It doesn't get too loud though and the lights that pulse to the music don't get as bright as I would like them to. They're prefect for a small-medium sized room but not that great for a living room.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound and light options!
customer_reviews.text: Love listening to my podcasts in the morning and my music! This is perfect and sound is amazing, the lights are so pretty and bright, the have dimmer options also and if you don’t like the clock just shut it off in the back with switch!
customer_reviews.author: Chelbell

customer_reviews.title: It is a nice looking light and I like the colors changing
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice looking light and I like the colors changing. The speaker is good value for the price. However, the display does not keep the time shown even with it is plugged in. The only way for the display to continual show the time is to keep it connected to bluetooth- which I don't feel like I should always have to do. Also, it is difficult to figure out how to turn the alarm on and off. I did follow the directions but still could not get it to work.
customer_reviews.author: LASHON W.

customer_reviews.title: No way to adjust alarm volume
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little alarm clock/night light however the alarm volume cannot be adjusted and it is very loud. The built in alarm is a pleasant sound but can wake my entire two story house from a dead sleep. Adjusting the time and alarm is a little annoying too if you don't press the buttons quite the right length of time and the colors keep changing as you're trying to change the time and alarm which is a little annoying. It's a lot of money to not be able to adjust the alarm much.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Medla

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound and night light helps my son fall asleep
customer_reviews.text: My son loves to fall asleep looking at the changing lights. We use it also as an alarm in his room and to play music from SD card or Bluetooth. All around a great speaker!
customer_reviews.author: Alla

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic. It would be nice if it were easier ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. It would be nice if it were easier to set/unset the alarm though. As it is you have to push six buttons to turn it on or off. The tune it plays is wonderful though.
customer_reviews.author: thinice

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty good, we use it for its basic functions for my 4 year old. Little bright for a night light so we put a stuffed animal in front of it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Good clock & music player
customer_reviews.text: We bought 3 of these for 2 kids and myself. Kids play music during bed time every night and both love it. After about 6 months one of the units had problem where clock display, the light, and music from usb card all randomly stop after a minute or so. Contacted Wamgra via email and Judy was very helpful in getting the problematic unit replaced promptly. My only tiny complaint is setting up a sleep timer while playing music involves pressing a couple of buttons many times, but not a deal breaker at all IMO
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Great alarm clock for my son! It works great and the nightlight is just perfect! Just rem to charge it at least once a wk and you are good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Nannika

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working, but customer service was great
customer_reviews.text: At first it worked great, but then the clock became faster and faster. I reset it two weeks ago and it's already 15 minutes ahead. Additionally, it sometimes freezes on one time until I notice and turn it off and on again. While the other features are handy, they're rendered relatively useless if the clock itself isn't functioning reliably. Update: Customer service contacted me and offered a replacement. I told them that I had already purchased a new clock, so they offered me a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not one to write reviews but always read them before buying a product. Reading the negative reviews left me a little hesitant with how hard it is to set up and blah blah blah. Setup took less than 5 minutes... instructions are very easy to follow and if you are having a hard time to set this up then you should get your head looked at. Don't pay attention to the negative reviews this is easily the best online product I've ever purchased!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy M.

customer_reviews.title: I love this so much, you have to get it.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing I’ve ever bought for myself. The light display is so pretty. I’m 20 years old and the lights lull me to bed. The music quality is absolutely fantastic. It has an alarm, Bluetooth speaker AND an aux chord. You can put your own music on it too. It’s such an incredible buy. I have not stopped raving about it for days.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Michele

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for to have a clock, night light and soothing sounds in my baby’s nursery. Love it! Sound quality is great and we just play nursery rhymes from Spotify and pandora!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I ABSOLUTELY LOVE this Bluetooth Speaker! I charge it at night and it lasts with me throughout the day. I take it everywhere! It's small enough to fit in my purse and Loud enough to BRING THE BEAT!!! Easy Bluetooth connection with my Android AND iphone! Overall GREAT SPEAKER!!!
customer_reviews.author: Samjcortez

customer_reviews.title: It's worth the Stars
customer_reviews.text: You won't be jamming out like a dance club with this but it does the job as a PC speaker/MP3/BT/Clock. I think the price is right on. I'd buy as a gift for anyone. I just wish it had a Remote Control!!!! Kind of annoying to reach all the way over desk to get to the Top where the controls are without making the lights go.
customer_reviews.author: epicfail

customer_reviews.title: It's a bluetooth speaker with an alarm function
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was getting an alarm with bluetooth functionality built in. Instead, it's just a bluetooth speaker that happens to have an alarm feature. It only has micro usb for charging. It's not like you can just plug it into the wall and just leave it. I've had it say low battery while it's plugged it. The ability to set the light directly is also limited.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Zeien

customer_reviews.title: Nightlight
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice clock and my daughter love it. My only wish is that it has an option of turning the light off after 30 minutes or so.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Alarm Music Player
customer_reviews.text: I really like the product’s appearance. It has so many different colors of light and I can also adjust the intensity of each light. The volume quality is also really good that I can use as the alarm and as a music player too. I can get up on time each morning with my favorite music!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful customer service
customer_reviews.text: After the owner personally reached out to me to refund and send me a new light, I felt like she deserved a lot of credit. I was very impressed that she went out if her way, that is exceptional customer service. I cannot wait to receive our new light to use for our daughter. I have no doubt if we have any issues the seller will immediately take care of it. I would absolutely recommend them 😁
customer_reviews.author: Huckiejo

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: Love this little speaker. Easy to pair and use. Battery life is good, just as stated. I would totally recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: Mom's favorite bedside lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter bought it for Mom, for Christmas. Mom uses it everyday as a bedside lamp, she loves it for that sole purpose.
customer_reviews.author: PH

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this gift for her room. Some difficulty setting it up but figured it out. Sound quality is pretty good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Gray

customer_reviews.title: Good product, great seller
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is easy to connect and has a nice volume to it. The colors are cool and the seller has great communication. Also delivery was fast. I highly recommend this seller and its products. thank you!
customer_reviews.author: licia

customer_reviews.title: ... yr old daughter's birthday present and she fell in love with it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 19 yr old daughter's birthday present and she fell in love with it! This is perfect for anyone who loves music. And the speaker gets really loud too.

product_meta.title: WamGra Night light Bluetooth Speaker, Alarm Clock Bluetooth Speaker Touch Control Color Changing Bedside Lamp, Portable Wireless Speaker with Lights
product_meta.description:
1.Is the time display always on? 
NO,After 2 minutes of inactivity the display will darken to save battery .Press the power button to display the clock again. 

2.How to set the time stay lit up?
Set to Bluetooth Mode(BLUE) and leave it, after 2 minutes the time will show and NEVER GO OFF

3.How to switch 12/24H system ? 
Military time to standard time,press forward or backward button to switch it,so easy . 

4.How to set the Alarm.?
From the standard time function, press MODE twice, You will see the bell icon to indicate the alarm clock function. Long press the MODE button, the hour will begin to blink.Adjust with the forward or backward buttons until the desired hour has been reached. Press MODE button and repeat the same operation to set the minute and alarm ON and OFF. 

5.How to freeze the color you like? 
48 light colors cycle automatically,choose what you want depend on your mood ,touch the top of the night light and hold until such color appears then release.

6.The easiest way to load your own alarm sound. 
Simply create a folder which is renamed to "ALARM" in your micro SD card or USB Flash Drive,put your alarm sound (MP3,WMA,FLAC formats) in this folder ,that's all.
